publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1032 Mark Ballard: Edinburgh University - A Fair Trade University—That the Parliament congratulates Edinburgh University on becoming a Fair Trade university; strongly supports the university’s Fair Trade policy; notes that the Fair Trade coffee brand, Cafédirect, is now the fourth largest roast and ground coffee brand in the UK, and believes that Fair Trade is the way forward for giving farmers in the third world a better deal.

S2M-1032 Edinburgh University - A Fair Trade University (lodged on 9 March 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Sarah Boyack*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Christine May*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Ms Sandra White*, Marlyn Glen*

S2M-1032 Edinburgh University - A Fair Trade University (lodged on 9 March 2004) Eleanor Scott*, Shiona Baird*, Alex Neil*, Chris Ballance*, Elaine Smith*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Scott Barrie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Kate Maclean*

S2M-1032 Mark Ballard: Edinburgh University - A Fair Trade University-That the Parliament congratulates Edinburgh University on becoming a Fair Trade university; strongly supports the university's Fair Trade policy; notes that the Fair Trade coffee brand, Cafédirect, is now the fourth largest roast and ground coffee brand in the UK, and believes that Fair Trade is the way forward for giving farmers in the third world a better deal. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie, Frances Curran, Sarah Boyack, Mr Jamie Stone, Christine May, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Dr Elaine Murray, Ms Sandra White, Marlyn Glen, Eleanor Scott, Shiona Baird, Alex Neil, Chris Ballance, Elaine Smith, Mr Mark Ruskell, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Scott Barrie, Nora Radcliffe, Kate Maclean, Mike Pringle*, Christine Grahame*, Margo MacDonald*, Robin Harper*
S2M-1032 Edinburgh University - A Fair Trade University (lodged on 9 March 2004) Fiona Hyslop*, Dr Jean Turner*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1032 Edinburgh University - A Fair Trade University (lodged on 9 March 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, John Swinburne*
S2M-1032 Edinburgh University - A Fair Trade University (lodged on 9 March 2004) Susan Deacon*
S2M-1032 Edinburgh University - A Fair Trade University (lodged on 9 March 2004) Patrick Harvie*, Linda Fabiani*
